locales.welcome: {#server}» {#welcome}Welcome {#highlite}{1}{#welcome} to {#highlite}{2}$z$s{br}{#server}» {#welcome}This server uses {#highlite}$L[{3}]UASECO/{4}$0$L{#welcome} to manage your records.
locales.banip_error: {#welcome}Could not connect:{br}{br}Your IP was banned from this server!
locales.banip_dialog: {#welcome}Your IP was banned from this server.$z
locales.connect_error: {#welcome}$sThis is an administrative notice.$z{br}{br}UASECO encountered a very rare player connection{br}problem. Please re-join the server to correct it.{br}Apologies for the inconvenience.{br}{br}$sThe server administrators.
locales.client_error: {#welcome}Obsolete client version!{br}Please upgrade to the $l[https://www.maniaplanet.com/download]latest version$l.
